decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Location Plan: unnumbered. Drawings: 01. Received: 28/04/2017.) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 6 - The outbuilding hereby permitted shall not be occupied at any time other than for purposes incidental to the residential use of the dwelling known as 59 Swyncombe Avenue, W5 4DR, and not as primary residential accommodation or for business purposes, nor shall any bathroom or kitchen facilities be installed into the outbuilding without the permission of the Local Planning Authority obtained through the submission of a planning application.
description: Demolition and erection of a single storey outbuilding in the rear garden to the house
